name: The Unseen (itch) (GoldenRusher)
description:
Made for Brackeys Gamejam 2022.1

Controls:

WSAD - Movement

Space - Jump

Left Mouse Button - First Ability

Right Mouse Button - Second Ability (available from level 2)

The Unseen is a platformer, but something seems off. Make your way home, find friends along the way and learn your new found abilities...
